basic.description: This course covers functions, sequences, limits; continuity, uniform continuity; differentiation; integration; convergence, uniform convergence. For strong students with advisor approval only.
basic.subject: MAA
basic.title: Advanced Calculus I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 2313, MAS 3105, and prior experience with mathematical proofs (MGF 3301, MAD 2104, or other proving experience).
